briefDescription: Vidya & Child works in marginalised communities, exploring the unique potential in each child by providing opportunities for value integrated learning and development.Â It works with 1600 first generation learners from age 4+ to 20+ years of age across 4 different communities in Noida (Delhi NCR) and 1 in Siwan (Bihar)
